# Model Card: pivot_inventory_mega

| Property | Value |
| ---------- | ------- |

| Resolution | 256x256 |

## Description

Pivot Inventory is a detection model designed for geospatial applications.
This is the mega variant with high capacity.

## Architecture

```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Input] --> B[Encoder]
    B --> C[Processing]
    C --> D[Decoder]
    D --> E[Output]
```

- Geospatial analysis
- Remote sensing applications
